title: I have the "battery stuck at 50% issue", how can I get my Pixel 4xl warrantied?
content:
I have owned every pixel phone and never had a single issue.

I wake up this morning to a dead phone. I plug it in to charge it and there's a question mark on the battery symbol.

Then I tried to turn it on and it turns on and it's sitting at 50% battery. Well that's strange... There's no way I could have charged 50% in 5 minutes.

I look online and I say that this is a known problem and that I'm supposed to get a replacement phone through warranty.

How exactly do I go about doing that?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
